page.title: 20A Typical Family
page.content: After making my bed,I went downstairs and fed the hamster and fish.Lynn got up and helped me clean the hamster out.Julie got up and went to work with Dad.Lynn took the dog for a walk.I cleaned my room and Mum tidied the other rooms up.Lynn washed the breakfast pots.For dinner we had chicken,mashed potato and sprouts.Dad came home at 3pm and took us to Epworth Garden Centre whilst Lynn stayed at home watching television. Mum bought some plants which Dad and I put in the garden after tea.We had a meat salad for tea ay 5pm.Lynn took the dog for a walk,Julie watched television and Mum washed up.I tried to phone a friend but she was out so I watched television.My sisters and I went to bed about 10pm and our parents followed about half an hour later.
